thread.section_title: LensDirect Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LensDirect | lensdirect.com
thread.title: Ed & Lisa

author: Ed & Lisa
title: Ed & Lisa
text: I received my first order with no issues. My second order however was a completely different experience and will definitely be my last. My Rep, Amanda, was at first nice in emails and on the phone with me. However, she was rude and lacked professional phone manners and was deceptive when she spoke with my Dr.s office so much so that the Office manager had to intervene. Her attitude and language was totally unacceptable and I was personally embarrassed when notified by my Dr.s office. From there I then received multiple emails from her each one showed aggressive punctuation and frustration. The issue was finally resolved but I assure you, I will not be dealing with this company again.
